docs.abstract: Extra Bases; as teams compile more and more information on hitters’ trends, managers can predict more accurately than ever where ground balls are most likely to go and can shift around their infielders; in this new frontier of defensive positioning, teams are learning as they go; other news noted.

docs.abstract: Outfielder Alfonso Soriano was hitless in his first four games this season, but has been hot since recording his first hit, continuing a career resurgence with the New York Yankees; Soriano’s two hits, including a home run, are part of the offensive onslaught in the Yankees’ 7-4 victory against the Boston Red Sox.
